I'm Mark (Yixuan Xie) -- I am a coming junior student majoring in Comp Science and Statistics at the University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign (UIUC). I am a CS enthusiast who loves seeking creative solutions to complex challenges! Feel free to connect with me, ask questions, or simply start a conversation about the latest tech trends, coding challenges, or any other topic that sparks your interest.


The word "å­¤ç‹¬ã®æŸ’" means A Lonly Seven. It's a blend of the evocative phrase Either lonly or vulgar, and my cherished number "7". Though, at the time I coined this name, I had not yet delved into the works of Schopenhauer. My affection for the number 7 was inspired by the poem, â€œThe Square Root of Three.â€
